scripts.install: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && tsc --project server/tsconfig.json
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run build:server" "node-dev --watch dist/index.html dist/index.js"
scripts.deploy: zip -r app.zip . && az webapp deployment source config-zip  --resource-group PrevilonHealth-eus  --name previlonhealth  --src app.zip
